context.title: Changelog for Rule: Audio-only as a media alternative for text

context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"afb423","name":"Audio-only as a media alternative for text","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks `audio` is a media alternative for text on the page.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
